shortDescription: Unspecified vulnerability in the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) component in Oracle Java SE 7 Update 17 and earlier allows remote attackers to affect integrity via unknown vectors related to Deployment.
vulnerabilityName: Oracle Java SE 7 Update 17 and earlier Java Runtime Environment (JRE) Vulnerability
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
